Package oracle.kubernetes.operator.rest.resource

Class ScaleClusterResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.kubernetes.operator.rest.resource.BaseResource
      • oracle.kubernetes.operator.rest.resource.ScaleClusterResource
  • public class ScaleClusterResource
extends BaseResource
    ScaleResource is a jaxrs resource that implements the REST api for the /operator/{version}/domains/{domainUID}/clusters/{cluster}/scale path. It can be used to scale up or down the number of managed servers in a WebLogic cluster.

      • ScaleClusterResource

        public ScaleClusterResource​(BaseResource parent,

        parent - - the jaxrs resource that parents this resource.
        pathSegment - - the last path segment in the url to this resource.

    • Method Detail

      • post

        @POST
@Consumes("application/json")
public void post​(ScaleClusterParamsModel params)
        Scale this WebLogic cluster up or down. This method configures the specified numer of managed servers at both the Kubernetes and WebLogic levels, then returns. It does not wait for the new managed servers to start or removed managed servers to stop.
        Parameters:
        params - - a ScaleClusterParamsModel that specifies the desired number of managed servers in the cluster
